Things to do in the library
(except reading books and periodicals)
  • Practice musical instruments in special rooms
  • Work in a cozy and simple coworking space
  • Drink coffee and snack
  • Take home a book
  • Attend a meeting or teleconference with writers
  • Go to foreign language classes
  • Cultural program: listen to a lecture, visit an exhibition, concert or performance, go to a meeting with actors, directors, poets
  • Take part in an interesting master class
  • Arrange a photo session
  • Watch a movie, listen to music
  • Record a song on professional equipment
  • Play areas for children
